title: How to Copy a PSP UMD

steps.headline: Your PSP must have Custom Firmware (CFW)
A menu titled VSH menu will appear
Go to USB device and choose UMD
Connect to the computer with USB cable
Open your usual PSP folder in 'My Computer'.
steps.description: You should see a ISO file titled 'UMD9660'

steps.headline: Copy it to the desired place.

text: Your PSP must have Custom Firmware (CFW)  Press the SELECT button  A menu titled VSH menu will appear  Go to USB device and choose UMD  Connect to the computer with USB cable  Open your usual PSP folder in 'My Computer'. You should see a ISO file titled 'UMD9660' Copy it to the desired place. Put it in your PSP.
sentences: Your PSP must have Custom Firmware (CFW)  Press the SELECT button  A menu titled VSH menu will appear  Go to USB device and choose UMD  Connect to the computer with USB cable  Open your usual PSP folder in 'My Computer'.
You should see a ISO file titled 'UMD9660' Copy it to the desired place.
